definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: You can reduce your output by avoiding aerosols and driving less, for starters.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过避用气雾剂或少开车来减少起动机的排气。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the efficacy and safty of zinc pyrithione spray against psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价吡啶硫锌气雾剂治疗银屑病的疗效和安全性。

sentences.english: Does old people stop with agent of mist of Yunnan Baiyao gas what side effect does arthralgia have?
sentences.chinese: 老年人用云南白药气雾剂止关节痛有什么副作用？

sentences.english: Do not spray aerosol or pump products in enclosed areas.
sentences.chinese: 不喷气雾剂或泵产品，在密封领域。

sentences.english: The spray is packaged in 100 mL aerosol containers.
sentences.chinese: 喷雾是封装在100毫升气雾剂容器。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety of household insecticide aerosol.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价家用卫生杀虫气雾剂的安全性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of Terbutaline aerosol curing children' s Asthma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察特布他林气雾剂治疗儿童哮喘的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Laboratory efficacy criterions of public health insecticides for pesticide registration-Aerosol.
sentences.chinese: 农药登记卫生用杀虫剂的室内药效评价气雾剂。

sentences.english: This is true of almost all aerosol propellants.
sentences.chinese: 几乎所有的气雾剂推进剂都是这样。

definition: albuterol, kind of chemical used in treating asthma
voltaren, a trade name for diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller

pinyin: bing3 suan1 fu2 ti4 ka3 song1
